posts.post_content:
Here's a link to what I have: [url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/indianapolis-master[/url]

Needs:
Burke: Carolina Brights, Drum 350, EPDG, Old Mill, Tolstoi
Carr: AB350, BL350, Carolina Brights, C350, Drum 350, EPDG, Old Mill, Sweet Caporal 350 (Factories 25 & 30), Tolstoi
Cross: Sweet Caporal 350 (Factory 25), Tolstoi
Davidson: BL350, Carolina Brights, Drum 350, EPDG, Old Mill, Sweet Caporal 350 (Factory 25), Tolstoi
Hayden: BL350, C350, Drum 350, Sweet Caporal 350 (Factory 25)

I'd like to trade either the Davidson Cycle 350 SGC20 (below) or a freshley graded 30 (in transit) for a similar (or lesser) condition C350 of Carr or Hayden:
